title: Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930s
medium:
Medium: silk, beads, faux pearls, rhinestones
Technique: embroidery on plain weave
description: Grey-beige ground embroidered with gold seed beads, faux pearls and rhinestones in a floral pattern.  Drawn pattern continues the motif.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930s.Medium: silk, beads, faux pearls, rhinestones
Technique: embroidery on plain weave. Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-50.
